title: EXT_materials_diffuse_roughness glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines roughness of the base diffuse surface.

diffuseRoughnessTexture.description: A greyscale texture, representing the diffuse layer's roughness.
diffuseRoughnessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: A greyscale texture, representing the diffuse layer's roughness. The value will modulate the diffuseRoughnessFactor.
